root: ^[Addison] I wish we could tell her -
^[Mom] I know. Don’t say it; we’re going to make her more sad.
^[Addison] I feel bad for her, though.
^[Addison] She lost her mom like me…
^[Addison] See, there’s nothing good in the world. Everything sucks.
^[Addison] Everyday since you’ve been gone, I feel like I have a hole in my heart.
^[Addison] There’s no point in doing anything. I just want to hole myself in my bed and never wake up.
^[Mom] Those people you just talked to? They all care about you.
^[Mom] Don’t forget that, Addison. Just because I’m gone doesn’t mean you stop living.
^[Mom] Live life for me. I want you to enjoy life.
